content.text:
# List of naval battles between battleships

This is a list of naval battles in history where steel vessels rated as battleships and/or battlecruisers engaged each other in combat.
{| class="wikitable"
! style="width: 8.5em;" | Date !! Battles !! Conflict !! Combatants A !! Combatants B !! Result
|-
| 8–9 February 1904 || Battle of Port Arthur || Russo-Japanese War || align=center| Imperial Japanese Navy || align=center|Imperial Russian Navy|| Indecisive
|-
| 10 August 1904 || Battle of the Yellow Sea || Russo-Japanese War || align=center| Imperial Japanese Navy || align=center|Imperial Russian Navy|| Japanese victory
|-
| 27–28 May 1905 || Battle of Tsushima || Russo-Japanese War || align=center| Imperial Japanese Navy || align=center| Imperial Russian Navy|| Japanese victory
|-
| 16 December 1912 || Battle of Elli || First Balkan War || align=center| Royal Hellenic Navy || align=center|Ottoman Navy|| Greek victory
|-
| 18 January 1913 || Battle of Lemnos || First Balkan War || align=center| Royal Hellenic Navy || align=center|Ottoman Navy|| Greek victory
|-
| 29 October 1914 || Black Sea Raid || World War I || align=center| Ottoman Navy || align=center| Imperial Russian Navy || Ottoman Victory
|-
| 18 November 1914 || Battle of Cape Sarych || World War I || align=center| Ottoman Navy || align=center| Imperial Russian Navy || Indecisive
|-
| 24 January 1915 || Battle of Dogger Bank (1915) || World War I || align=center| Kaiserliche Marine || align=center| Royal Navy || British victory
|-
| 10 May 1915 || Action of 10 May 1915 || World War I || align=center| Ottoman Navy || align=center| Imperial Russian Navy || Indecisive
|-
| 8–19 August 1915 || Battle of the Gulf of Riga || World War I || align=center| Kaiserliche Marine || align=center|Imperial Russian Navy|| Russian victory
|-
| 8 January 1916 || Action of 8 January 1916 || World War I || align=center| Ottoman Navy || align=center| Imperial Russian Navy || Indecisive
|-
| 31 May – 1 June 1916 || Battle of Jutland || World War I || align=center| Kaiserliche Marine || align=center|Royal Navy|| British Strategic Victory/German Tactical Victory
|-
| 16 October – 3 November 1917 || Battle of Moon Sound || World War I || align=center| Kaiserliche Marine || align=center|Imperial Russian Navy|| German victory
|-
| 17 November 1917 || Second Battle of Heligoland Bight || World War I || align=center| Kaiserliche Marine || align=center|Royal Navy|| Indecisive
|-
| 9 April 1940 || Action off Lofoten || World War II || align=center| Royal Navy || align=center|Kriegsmarine|| Indecisive
|-
| 3 July 1940 || Battle of Mers-el-Kébir || World War II || align=center| Royal Navy || align=center|Vichy French Navy|| British victory
|-
| 9 July 1940 || Battle of Calabria || World War II || align=center| Royal Navy || align=center|Regia Marina|| Indecisive
|-
| 23–25 September 1940 || Battle of Dakar || World War II || align=center| Royal Navy || align=center|Vichy French Navy|| Vichy French victory
|-
| 27 November 1940 || Battle of Cape Spartivento || World War II || align=center| Royal Navy || align=center|Regia Marina || Indecisive
|-
| 24 May 1941 || Battle of the Denmark Strait || World War II || align=center| Royal Navy || align=center|Kriegsmarine|| German victory
|-
| 26–27 May 1941 || Hunt for the Bismarck || World War II || align=center| Royal Navy || align=center|Kriegsmarine|| British victory
|-
| 8–16 November 1942 || Battle of Casablanca || World War II || align=center| United States Navy || align=center|Vichy French Navy|| American victory
|-
| 14–15 November 1942 || Second Battle of Guadalcanal || World War II || align=center| United States Navy || align=center|Imperial Japanese Navy|| American victory
|-
| 26 December 1943 || Battle of North Cape || World War II || align=center| Royal Navy || align=center|Kriegsmarine|| British victory
|-
| 25 October 1944 || Battle of Surigao Strait || World War II || align=center| United States Navy || align=center|Imperial Japanese Navy|| American victory
